attributes.action: A REINDEER IS NOT JUST FOR CHRISTMAS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
North Ayrshire Council want to kill reindeer.
The Councils Assistant chief Executive MR MC KAY has ordered the removal of the reindeers shelter by the 30th december 2009. He says reindeer do not require shelter or any form of protection from the weather.
we petition the prime minister to allow these great animals to have a shelter and a clean dry home that offers protection from the weather.
If the shelters are removed it leaves the reindeer centre ayrshire(scotland) open to be procecuted under animal welfare act  and may cause harm to reindeer. please sign our petition to save the reindeer shelters and ask for the resignation of assistant chief executive of north ayrshire council  MR MC KAY who wants to cause these great animals harm , our reindeer are happy and well cared for and free to roam.
THIS IS A GOVERMENT MATTER AS FALLS WITHIN THE ANIMAL WEFARE ACTS.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
